programme.title: משפחה במסכה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות סוחפת. אנה מקבלת את חליפת הסופר-על שלה בדיוק כמו כל משפחתה. יש רק בעיה אחת - אין בה שום תכונה שמתאימה לגיבור-על וכעת בטחון העיר תלוי בה. דיבוב: יובל ינאי, אסתי קוסוביצקי. במאי: ראסמוס סיברסטן, 2022.

programme.title: כלב מי שמנגן 3 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מוזיקלית. לאחר מסע הופעות מסביב לעולם, חוזר בודי כלב הרוקנרול לכפר הולדתו ומצטרף לצוות שופטים בתוכנית ריאליטי מוזיקלית, כדי ללמד את הדור הבא איך עושים את זה נכון... דיבוב: ברק ברויטמן. במאי: אנתוני בל. 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: נורם בעיר הגדולה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. נורם הוא דוב לבן שיכול לדבר עם בני אדם. כאשר פרוייקט מגורים שאפתני מאיים על החיים בקוטב הצפוני, הוא נוסע לניו יורק, יחד עם חבריו הזעירים, למבצע הצלה. מדובב לעברית. במאי: טרבור וול. ארה"ב, 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מטוסי על: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. הדמויות האהובות מהסדרה הפופולרית בהרפתקה סוחפת. ג'ט, מטוס הסילון המהיר בעולם נקלע למזימה של בילי ווילי, הנבל העירוני שמתכנן לגרום לשיבושים בעיר. יחד עם מטוסי העל הנאמנים הם יוצאים להציל את העיר. מדובב לעב'. 2024.

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. ריידר וכלבי יחידת החילוץ נקראים לעיר ההרפתקאות על מנת לנסות ולהציל אותה מראש העיר המדינגר, המשחק בצורה מסוכנת עם מזג האוויר בעיר וגרם להרס וחורבן. דיבוב עב': שיר כהן. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2021. כ' עב'.

programme.title: טרולים (מדובב)
programme.desc: על מנת להציל את חבריה מהברגנים, יוצאת פופי מנהיגת הטרולים האופטימית עם בראנץ' הטרול הנרגן, להרפתקה בעולמות רחוקים. דיבוב: לירון לב, נועה קירל. בימוי: וולט דורן, מייק מיטשל. 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הדרקון הראשון שלי 3: העולם הנסתר (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה, החלק המסיים את הטרילוגיה הקסומה מבית דרימוורקס ("שרק"). החיים בעיר הסודית של הויקינגים ודרקוניהם ניצבים בפני סכנה כאשר צייד דרקונים אימתני מגלה את מיקום העיר. דיבוב עב': ניב פטל. במאי: דין דבלואה. 2019. כ' עב'.\r\n.

programme.title: חלום של רובוט
programme.desc: אנימציה מרגשת לכל המשפחה. רובוט וכלב הם החברים הכי טובים שחיים בניו יורק התוססת של שנות ה-80. לאחר בילוי בחוף, רובוט הופך לחלוד וכלב נאלץ להשאיר אותו מאחור, לחלום על הזמן שבילו יחד. במאי: פבלו ברגר. ספרד, 2023. כ' עב'.

programme.title: המופלאה: הרפתקאות ליידי באג (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות על פי הסדרה האהובה. שני מתבגרים פריזאיים הופכים לגיבורי-העל "חיפושית" ו"חתול שחור", כדי להגן על העיר מפני כוחות הרשע של עש הלילה, הנבל המרושע. דיבוב עב': ספיר דרמון. במאי: ז'רמי זג. צרפת, 2023.

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את המורה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה. פליקס מכווץ בטעות את מנהלת בית הספר הקשוחה לגובה של 15 ס"מ. כשכולם בטוחים שעשה זאת בכוונה, הוא יוצא להרפתקה להוכיח את חפותו ולמנוע את סגירת ביה"ס. במאי: סוון אונטרוואלד. גרמניה, 2015. כ' עב'.

programme.title: דורה והעיר האבודה
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. דורה, החוקרת הצעירה מהג'ונגל, יוצאת יחד עם חבריה החדשים מהתיכון להרפתקת חייה במטרה להציל את הוריה שנעלמו, ולפתור תעלומה מסתורית. עם: איזבלה מונר, אווה לונגוריה. במאי: ג'יימס בובין. 2019.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: רובינזון קרוזו (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. באי קטן ואקזוטי חי לו תוכי חביב עם חבריו, בע"ח שונים ומשונים. יום אחד, לאחר שהסערה הקשה שככה, הם מוצאים על האי יצור מוזר, רובינזון קרוזו שמו. דיבוב: דניאל מורשת. במאי: וינסנט קסטלוט. צרפת, 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: חבר על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפור התבגרותו מחמם הלב של כלבלב קטן בשם ג'וק, אשר נלחם על מקומו בין חבריו הגדולים. במהלך מסע מאתגר בדרום אפריקה, הוא לומד להאמין בעוצמתו הפנימית. דיבוב עברית. במאי: דנקן מקניילי. 2011. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: משימה חתולית בהחלט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. חתולה משועממת, המעבירה את רוב זמנה מול הטלויזיה, מחליטה להכניס קצת אקשן לחייה ויוצאת לחפש אחר כנופיית פורצים בשכונה. לרוע מזלה, היא וחבריה נחשדים ע"י המשטרה כי הם עצמם הפורצים. גרמניה, 2018. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: כבשים וזאבים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. גריי, הזאב החביב, רוצה להיבחר למנהיג הלהקה, ואף מסתכן בכישוף, שלהפתעתו הופך אותו לאיל! מי שבאים לעזרתו הם הכבשים מהעדר השכן. דיבוב: אורי זלצמן. בימוי: אנדריי גאלאט, מקסים וולקוב. רוסיה, 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הקדמונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. השלווה בעמק הקדמונים מופרת כאשר לורד רשע מתכוון להשתלט על העמק ולהפוך אותו למכרה. מולו מתייצב איש מערות צעיר שלא מתכוון לוותר על העמק שלו ושל חבריו כל כך בקלות. דיבוב: אלי פיניש. במאי: ניק פארק. 2018. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: סיפור הברווזים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מהיוצרים של "המיניונים". משפחת ברווזים יוצאת לראשונה לחופשה מפנקת בג'מייקה. בטעות מגיעה המשפחה לניו-יורק. וכעת היא צריכה למצוא את דרכה החוצה מהעיר שהיא הכל חוץ מגן עדן לברווזים. דיבוב: רשף לוי. 2023 כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הדב פדינגטון (מדובב)
programme.desc: סרט ילדים קסום, משעשע ונוגע ללב שכבש את העולם. עלילותיו של פדינגטון: דב מתוק, נבון ודי שובב, המגיע ללונדון מיערות פרו הרחוקים ופוגש משפחה המעניקה לו בית חם. עם: ניקול קידמן. במאי: פול קינג. בריטניה, 2014. כ' עב'.\r\n.(n)

programme.title: פדינגטון 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. פדינגטון הדוב האנגלי החמוד חוזר והפעם הוא מתכנן לקנות מתנה יוקרתית לדודתו האהובה שחוגגת את יום הולדתה המאה. העלילה מסתבכת כאשר המתנה שהוא רוצה לקנות, נגנבת מהחנות. במאי: פול קינג. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: אגדה ממבט ראשון (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב קורע של דניאל סטיופין (אנטולי מ"קופה ראשית"). אביר צעיר ואמיץ לב יוצא ביחד עם חרבו המטורללת וחברים נוספים, למסע להשבת אבן עתיקה שנגנבה מארמון המלך, וכעת אחדות הממלכה נמצאת בסכנה. 2021.(n)

programme.title: ספיידרמן: ברחבי ממדי העכביש (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית אקשן שוברת קופות, מועמדת לפרס אוסקר 2024. מיילס מוראלס, הספיידרמן הצעיר, חוזר לשתף פעולה עם שלל אנשי ונשות עכביש מרחבי העולם כדי להילחם בנבל מרושע ועוצמתי מתמיד. דיבוב עב': גל שמי. במאי: חואקים דוס סנטוס. 2023.(n)

programme.title: צבי הנינג'ה: טירוף המוטנטים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה שוברת קופות. צבי הנינג'ה הצעירים מבינים כי יהיה להם קשה להשתלב בחברה כבני נוער רגילים. כשארגון פשע מפלצתי מגיע לניו יורק, מבינים הצבים כי זו ההזדמנות שלהם להציל את העיר וגם, להפוך למקובלים. דיבוב: תובל שפיר. 2023. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: The Masters - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the featured groups on round one of the first Major of the year, held at Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Rory McIlroy will be looking to finally end his wait for victory at this tournament, and if he does success he will become just the sixth modern era player to win the career Grand Slam. His last Major win came back in 2014 when he won the PGA Championship for the second time. He also won The Open Championship that year to take his record up to four Major wins, but he has yet to succeed at this event. American Scottie Scheffler currently holds the title having won his second Masters last year.(n)

programme.title: Live SPFL
programme.desc: Aberdeen v Rangers (Kick-off 12.00pm). Coverage of the Scottish Premiership match from Pittodrie. These two sides have met twice in the league already this season, winning one game each. This meeting back in October saw Aberdeen come away with a 2-1 victory thanks to Shayden Morris' 74th-minute winner. Nicky Devlin had given the hosts the lead in the first half before Nedim Bajrami scored in the 63rd minute for Rangers, only for Morris to score nine minutes later for Aberdeen to win the game.(n)

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Liverpool v West Ham United (Kick-off 2.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Anfield, as the hosts look for three more points in their quest for the league title. Liverpool came away from the London Stadium with a 5-0 victory in the reverse fixture at the end of December. Goals from Luis Diaz, Cody Gakpo and Mohamed Salah gave the Reds a 3-0 lead at half time, before Trent Alexander-Arnold and Diogo Jota completed the scoring in the second half.(n)

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Newcastle United v Manchester United (Kick-off 4.30pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from St James' Park. The hosts are on a good run of form against the Red Devils having won four of the last five meetings between the two sides. The reverse fixture at the end of December saw Alexander Isak and Joelinton score in the opening 19 minutes to give the Magpies a 2-0 victory at Old Trafford.(n)

programme.title: The Masters - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the fourth and final round of the first Major of the year, held at the Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Scottie Scheffler's concluding round of 68 in last year's tournament helped him finish four strokes clear of Ludvig Aberg to win this title for the second time in three years. The American could join the likes of Nick Faldo, Phil Mickelson, Gary Player and Jimmy Demaret in becoming a three-time winner at this event.(n)

programme.title: Hawaii
programme.desc: A 19th-century missionary and his wife try to bring Christianity to the natives of the Hawaiian islands, little realising that their incursion will forever change the attitude of the indigenous population. It's not long before the couple's differing viewpoints drive a wedge between them - leading to betrayal. Historical drama, starring Max von Sydow, Julie Andrews and Richard Harris.(n)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Biopic of soul singer Ray Charles, exploring his battle against racial bigotry, drug addiction and personal demons on his rise to stardom. Blind by the time he was seven, the musician flirted with several styles including gospel, jazz and country, and became known as one of the music industry's most innovative performers. Starring an Oscar-winning Jamie Foxx alongside Regina King and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A shy man struggling to cope with a recent break-up is horrified to learn his impulsive former girlfriend has had all recollection of their relationship erased from her mind. He gets even by having the same treatment, but during the procedure he relives their time together and falls for her again, leaving him determined to keep his memories. Michel Gondry's surreal romantic drama, with Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson and Elijah Wood.(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Remake of the 1984 drama, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid.(n)

programme.title: Sundown
programme.desc: Neil and Alice Bennett are the core of a wealthy family on holiday in Mexico, until a distant emergency cuts their trip short. When one relative disrupts the family's tight-knit order, simmering tensions rise to the fore. Drama, starring Tim Roth, Albertine Kotting McMillan and Samuel Bottomley.(n)

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Fact-based romantic drama based on the life of writer Karen Blixen, who, after relocating from Denmark to a farm in Nairobi for a marriage of convenience, embarked on a passionate and ill-fated love affair with an idealistic British adventurer. Starring Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Kitchen, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Leslie Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: When two young men cross paths in Berlin, a simple afternoon in the big city soon takes on a much greater meaning. Drama, starring Matthew Morrison and Alexandros Koutsoulis.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Biopic of soul singer Ray Charles, exploring his battle against racial bigotry, drug addiction and personal demons on his rise to stardom. Blind by the time he was seven, the musician flirted with several styles including gospel, jazz and country, and became known as one of the music industry's most innovative performers. Starring an Oscar-winning Jamie Foxx alongside Regina King and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.(n)

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: When two young men cross paths in Berlin, a simple afternoon in the big city soon takes on a much greater meaning. Drama, starring Matthew Morrison and Alexandros Koutsoulis.(n)

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Fact-based romantic drama based on the life of writer Karen Blixen, who, after relocating from Denmark to a farm in Nairobi for a marriage of convenience, embarked on a passionate and ill-fated love affair with an idealistic British adventurer. Starring Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Kitchen, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Leslie Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby, and his dying mother Gwen. Helen's life is a grind, but she has a chance at romance when a secret love returns. Writer/director Janis Pugh's drama, starring Louise Brealey and Annabel Scholey.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of negotiations between implacable enemies - the secret back-channel talks, unlikely friendships and quiet heroics of a small but committed group of Israelis, Palestinians and one Norwegian couple that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords. Starring Ruth Wilson, Andrew Scott and Jeff Wilbusch.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: When two young men cross paths in Berlin, a simple afternoon in the big city soon takes on a much greater meaning. Drama, starring Matthew Morrison and Alexandros Koutsoulis.(n)

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of murdered executive Sam Wheat tries to find a way to help his girlfriend Molly Jensen bring killer Carl Bruner to justice, and enlists the aid of fraudulent medium Oda Mae Brown - who is amazed and baffled when her supposed psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and a Whoopi Goldberg, who won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for her role as Brown.(n)

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby, and his dying mother Gwen. Helen's life is a grind, but she has a chance at romance when a secret love returns. Writer/director Janis Pugh's drama, starring Louise Brealey and Annabel Scholey.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of negotiations between implacable enemies - the secret back-channel talks, unlikely friendships and quiet heroics of a small but committed group of Israelis, Palestinians and one Norwegian couple that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords. Starring Ruth Wilson, Andrew Scott and Jeff Wilbusch.

programme.title: Through a Glass Darkly
programme.desc: A former mental institution inmate returns to her family, but faces an uphill struggle to readjust to life in the outside world. Ingmar Bergman's drama, starring Harriet Andersson and Max von Sydow. In Swedish.

programme.title: Cries and Whispers
programme.desc: Agnes, a woman dying of cancer, is visited in her remote home by her two sisters. Far from offering comfort, their arrival brings long-buried family conflicts bubbling to the surface, with tensions rising as Agnes' health deteriorates. Ingmar Bergman's drama, starring Harriet Andersson, Liv Ullmann and Ingrid Thulin. In Swedish.

programme.title: Phantom Thread
programme.desc: Celebrated British dressmaker Reynolds Woodcock falls in love with Alma, a shy but strong-willed waitress who refuses to conform to his meticulous way of living. Paul Thomas Anderson's Oscar-winning drama, starring Daniel Day-Lewis in his final role before retirement, alongside Vicky Krieps and Lesley Manville.

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: A woman goes to work as a cocktail waitress at a burlesque club which is teetering on the brink of closure. The manager gives her the chance to perform and she has soon become the venue's star attraction, drawing the attention of a sleazy developer with plans for the site. Musical drama, starring Cher, Christina Aguilera, Cam Gigandet and Stanley Tucci.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film.

programme.title: Ghost

Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and a Whoopi Goldberg, who won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for her role as Brown.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.

programme.title: Through a Glass Darkly
programme.desc: A former mental institution inmate returns to her family, but faces an uphill struggle to readjust to life in the outside world. Ingmar Bergman's drama, starring Harriet Andersson and Max von Sydow. In Swedish.

programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

Musical drama, starring Cher, Christina Aguilera, Cam Gigandet and Stanley Tucci.

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: A nouveau riche socialite with a murky past tries to buy his way into high society. A young man from the Midwest is drawn into his glamorous world, and witnesses the playboy's ultimately tragic efforts to win back the love of his life, now married to a far more respectable husband. Oscar-winning drama, based on F Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, starring Robert Redford, Mia Farrow, Sam Waterston, Bruce Dern, Karen Black and Scott Wilson.

programme.title: Mo' Better Blues
programme.desc: A self-centred jazz trumpeter's single-minded ambition alienates everyone who cares about him. Spike Lee's drama, with Denzel Washington, Wesley Snipes, Joie Lee, John Turturro and the director himself.

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: Burning an Illusion
programme.desc: A black woman living in West London hopes to marry her boyfriend, but finds her life thrown into upheaval when he loses his job and is subsequently arrested after getting into a fight. The experience makes her reassess her priorities, and she decides to reconnect with her African heritage. Drama, starring Cassie McFarlane and Victor Romero Evans.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. He turns to a tenacious lawyer to get him off the hook, but the attorney faces a challenge because the prosecution alleges the defendant killed the barman because he was having an affair with his wife. Otto Preminger's courtroom drama, starring James Stewart, Ben Gazzara, Lee Remick and Eve Arden.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip-hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.(n)

programme.title: Mo' Better Blues
programme.desc: A self-centred jazz trumpeter's single-minded ambition alienates everyone who cares about him. Spike Lee's drama, with Denzel Washington, Wesley Snipes, Joie Lee, John Turturro and the director himself.(n)

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: The story of Frank Abagnale Jr, who found notoriety as a teenager conning and charming his way across America. Posing as a pilot, a doctor and a lawyer, Frank was able to fund an extravagant lifestyle while outwitting the FBI at every turn. Fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen and James Brolin.(n)

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. He turns to a tenacious lawyer to get him off the hook, but the attorney faces a challenge because the prosecution alleges the defendant killed the barman because he was having an affair with his wife. Otto Preminger's courtroom drama, starring James Stewart, Ben Gazzara, Lee Remick and Eve Arden.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: Noah's Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noah's ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet.(n)

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A fisherman finds a friend in a lost penguin, and after taking the bird under his wing, he finds a new sense of joy. Director David Schurmann's drama inspired by a true story, starring Jean Reno and Adriana Barraza.(n)

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell.(n)

programme.title: Sneaks
programme.desc: Ty is a designer trainer who lives a life of luxury and comfort. However, when a shady shoe collector steals his sister, Ty, is forced to venture out into the world, and onto the streets of New York, to rescue her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Anthony Mackie, Keith David and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Right There
programme.desc: A woman navigates the challenges of her pregnant daughter's wedding plans, her mother's health concerns and her own romantic dilemmas. Director Brendan Walsh's comedy, starring Edie Falco and Jeannie Berlin.(n)

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A fisherman finds a friend in a lost penguin, and after taking the bird under his wing, he finds a new sense of joy. Director David Schurmann's drama inspired by a true story, starring Jean Reno and Adriana Barraza.(n)

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: A 17-year-old moves with her family to a resort where things are not what they seem. Writer/director Tilman Slinger's horror thriller, starring Hunter Schafer, Jan Bluthardt and Dan Stevens.(n)

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman.(n)

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales' thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer.(n)

programme.desc: Dive into a world of unmissable Sky Original films, from psychological thriller To Catch a Killer to the Oscar-nominated The Unites States vs Billie Holiday.(n)

At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales' thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A fisherman finds a friend in a lost penguin, and after taking the bird under his wing, he finds a new sense of joy. Director David Schurmann's drama inspired by a true story, starring Jean Reno and Adriana Barraza.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Sneaks
programme.desc: Ty is a designer trainer who lives a life of luxury and comfort. However, when a shady shoe collector steals his sister, Ty, is forced to venture out into the world, and onto the streets of New York, to rescue her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Anthony Mackie, Keith David and Laurence Fishburne.

programme.title: Touch
programme.desc: A man embarks on an emotional journey to find his first love who disappeared 50 years ago. Icelandic romantic drama, starring Egill Olafsson, Koki and Palmi Kormakur. In English, Japanese and Icelandic.(n)

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Years before the sentient robots became arch enemies, Optimus Prime and Megatron were friends on their home planet of Cybertron. However, their feud changes the universe forever. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Chris Hemsworth, Brian Tyree Henry, Scarlett Johansson and Keegan-Michael Key.(n)

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell.(n)

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: A rookie cop is partnered with an unhinged and morally dubious local officer in a small island town. A murder and the discovery of a million dollars soon turns the local community's lives upside down. Director Potsy Ponciroli's comedy, starring Himesh Patel, Lily James and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.(n)

programme.title: It Ends With Us

Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: In an out-of-this-world Muppet caper, Gonzo attempts to find his long-lost family, assisted by Kermit, Fozzie, and the rest of the gang.

programme.title: The Voyagers
programme.desc: Time jump to 1939 with Max and his friends as they try to navigate Rome to find Max's brother. Sky Original in Italian with subtitles.

programme.title: Blueback
programme.desc: Dive into the deep with Abby as she befriends a magnificent wild blue groper and takes on the poachers threatening it. Sky Original film with Mia Wasikowska and Eric Bana.

programme.desc: When a powerful book is stolen Wonder Woman, Supergirl and the rest of the team head to Atlantis in pursuit of underwater thieves. Animation.

programme.desc: When their rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two squabbling mutts must put their differences aside. Animated adventure.

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle Of The Five Armies
programme.desc: The future of Middle-earth hangs is at stake as Peter Jackson's epic trilogy concludes. Martin Freeman stars.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' The Lorax
programme.desc: In the synthetic town of Thneedville, a besotted boy takes up a quest to find the last real tree on earth. Animation with the voice of Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens
programme.desc: Five monsters are released by the government to battle an alien robot that invades Earth. Animation with Reese Witherspoon and Seth Rogen. Contains flashing images.

programme.desc: Discover the untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron's friendship on Cybertron. Animated sci-fi with the voice of Chris Hemsworth.

programme.desc: Years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back to Africa and into a trap. Reimagining of the classic tale starring Alexander Skarsgard.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Action comedy adventure based on the 1970s TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, and featuring Bill Murray. When a top computer boffin is kidnapped, crime-busting trio Natalie, Dylan and Alex become involved in a game of betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Hounds of War
programme.desc: After a mission goes wrong, one of a group of mercenaries is left alive to take revenge for his colleagues. Director Isaac Florentine's action thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Rhona Mitra and Robert Patrick.

programme.title: Gran Turismo
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Jann Mardenborough beats thousands of other gamers in the GT Academy competition organised by marketing executive Danny Moore. His prize is an opportunity to sit behind the wheel of a real racing car after intensive training from cynical former driver Jack Salter. Drama, starring David Harbour, Orlando Bloom and Archie Madekwe.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woo's remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: In the Stone Age, a gang of early humans face a mystical being hellbent on hunting them down. Prehistoric horror, starring Iola Evans and Arno LÃ¼ning. The dialogue is in a specially contructed language and features subtitles.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: A group of students unknowingly release an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. Horror, starring Harriet Slater, Adain Bradley and Jacob Batalon.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Swashbuckling historical adventure sequel starring FranÃ§ois Civil, Vincent Cassel and Eva Green. After his love Constance is kidnapped, young musketeer D'Artagnan sets out to rescue her, aided by the mysterious spy Milady de Winter, who's recently broken out of prison. Meanwhile, Porthos, Aramis and Athos are on their own mission...

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: Fantasy comedy starring Adam Sandler, Kate Beckinsale and Christopher Walken. Architect Michael Newman's will to succeed at work has come at the expense of quality time with his beautiful wife and children. But then Michael comes into possession of a remote control that allows him to pause, rewind and fast-forward his life just as he pleases.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Action comedy adventure based on the 1970s TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, and featuring Bill Murray. When a top computer boffin is kidnapped, crime-busting trio Natalie, Dylan and Alex become involved in a game of betrayal and deception.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Iro

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Jason Statham and Li Bingbing. After failing to save the crew of an imperilled submarine, deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is unfairly branded a drunk and a coward. Five years later, he spies an opportunity to prove everybody wrong when he is approached to aid a team of researchers in their fight against a giant prehistoric shark.

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. Director Ben Wheatley's comedy thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham and Cliff Curtis.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. His flashes of memory loss at work soon cause trouble, but redemption beckons when he attempts to reconnect with his estranged daughter and grandson.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Swashbuckling historical adventure sequel starring FranÃ§ois Civil, Vincent Cassel and Eva Green. programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: A group of students unknowingly release an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. Horror, starring Harriet Slater, Adain Bradley and Jacob Batalon.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/d

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. Crime drama, starring Eric Bana and Genevieve O'Reilly.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Riko and best friend Kane bungle the robbery of a local bank, causing one of the customers, hard man Leo Demarco, to suffer a heart attack. Fake news spreads that Leo is dead and Shotti, leader of one of East London's toughest firms, recruits Riko and Kane in gratitude for killing a rival. Comedy drama, starring Adam Deacon, Jennifer Saunders and Danny Sapani.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mother's new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Kelly Macdonald and Damian Lewis. Although they blend in with suburban middle-class society, Helen and Peter Radley are secretly abstinent vampires. But when their children suddenly become aware of this "family disease", the parents are forced to seek support from Peter's free-spirited twin, Will, who begins to rouse the family's feral urges.

programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine. Young Diana has been raised a warrior on the secret island of Themyscira, shielded from the perils of the real world. programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Ben Affleck. With an ancient demonic threat looming, Bruce Wayne, aka Batman, enlists the help of Diana Prince (Wonder Woman) to form a new superhero team. After adding Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash to its ranks, the league faces its first challenge: resurrecting Superman.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Jason Momoa, Amber Heard and Nicole Kidman. Arthur Curry (aka Aquaman), the half-human heir to the throne of Atlantis, has long since rejected his underwater brethren. But when his half-brother and current king Orm plots to destroy the surface world, Arthur is drawn into a quest to unite the marine realms and save humanity.

programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Kelly Macdonald and Damian Lewis. Although they blend in with suburban middle-class society, Helen and Peter Radley are secretly abstinent vampires. But when their children suddenly become aware of this "family disease", the parents are forced to seek support from Peter's free-spirited twin, Will, who begins to rouse the family's feral urges.

programme.title: Sing Sing
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a man imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.

programme.title: The Righteous Gemstones
programme.desc: Lori finds herself in an unpredictable position; Baby Billy tries to get his project approved; Kelvin and Vance face off.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop a cyborg killing machine, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

programme.title: Black Death
programme.desc: A monk investigates rumors of people being resurrected during an outbreak of the bubonic plague.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: The tragic death of Len Bias casts a shadow over the Celtics, and Larry Bird's style of play begins to take its toll; new rivals emerge with the Celtics going head-to-head with the Detroit Pistons in a heated 1987 playoff series; Bird retires.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: The exploits of various guests and employees at a tropical resort over the span of a week.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent (Henry Cavill) must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Jor-El (Marlon Brando) of Krypton sends his baby to Earth, where he grows up as Clark Kent (Christopher Reeve) and works at the Daily Planet.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: The tragic death of Len Bias casts a shadow over the Celtics, and Larry Bird's style of play begins to take its toll; new rivals emerge with the Celtics going head-to-head with the Detroit Pistons in a heated 1987 playoff series; Bird retires.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: The exploits of various guests and employees at a tropical resort over the span of a week.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Comedian John Oliver hosts an in-depth, satirical look at developments from the past seven days in news, politics and current events.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: The government sends the most dangerous supervillains in the world to the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese. Armed with high-tech weapons, they trek through the dangerous jungle on a search-and-destroy mission with Col. Rick Flag.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Imprisoned for a murder he did not commit, a three-time speedway champion (Jason Statham) must compete in a brutal auto race in which the penalty for losing is death.

programme.title: The Righteous Gemstones
programme.desc: Lori finds herself in an unpredictable position; Baby Billy tries to get his project approved; Kelvin and Vance face off.

programme.title: Y2K

programme.desc: When members of a dance troupe are lured to an empty school, drug-laced sangria causes their jubilant rehearsal to descend into a dark and explosive nightmare as they try to survive the night -- and find out who's responsible -- before it's too late.

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: In 1983 Italy, a precocious 17-year-old and a young doctoral student discover the heady beauty of awakening desire over the course of a summer that will alter their lives forever.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in. As the diabolical guest tries to get her claws on the child, Belinda must draw the line somewhere.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team face an underworld prince who plans to awaken a lethal army and use it to reclaim Earth for his magical kindred.

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An overprotective businessman (Bryan Cranston) panics after learning that his daughter's (Zoey Deutch) wealthy but socially awkward boyfriend (James Franco) plans to ask for her hand in marriage.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: A dismembered leg sent to Strike's office sends both his and Robin's lives into chaos; Strike thinks the limb could belong to a young girl who accused her stepfather of sexual abuse; Strike blames himself for the stepfather eluding justice.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Strike and Robin's partnership reaches a breaking point as Robin's wedding approaches; they disagree about how to catch a man who abuses children.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Strike and Robin's partnership reaches a breaking point as Robin's wedding approaches; they disagree about how to catch a man who abuses children.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Strike and Robin's partnership reaches a breaking point as Robin's wedding approaches; they disagree about how to catch a man who abuses children.

programme.title: Hamlet 2
programme.desc: Outraged citizens try to pull the plug on a staging of a lighthearted musical sequel to Shakespeare's tragedy, which has been written by the high-school drama teacher (Steve Coogan).

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Guided by a rebellious and charismatic coach (Hugh Jackman), British ski jumper Michael "Eddie" Edwards (Taron Egerton) trains for the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary, Alberta.

programme.title: Joker: Folie Ã Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Goodrich
programme.desc: Andy's life gets upended when his wife enters a 90-day rehab program, leaving him in charge of their twins. With his career falling by the wayside, he soon leans on his pregnant daughter for support, ultimately becoming the father she never had.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: When a deadly zombie virus sweeps the nation, a father stops at nothing to save his infected daughter.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: An FBI agent finds herself choosing sides between two factions of a criminal gang while trying to keep her hijacked plane from going down.

programme.title: Cracked
programme.desc: A feisty, young girl named Toya falls in love for the first time, but a series of disturbing events forces her to face her traumatic past.

programme.title: The Wave
programme.desc: A Norwegian geologist (Kristoffer Joner) and his family (Ane Dahl Torp, Jonas Hoff Oftebro) fight for survival when a massive landslide causes a 250-foot tidal wave.

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: A teen (Asa Butterfield) discovers a secret refuge on an island where children have special powers and hidden enemies.

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: Glee the 3D Concert Movie
programme.desc: Highlights of the "Glee" cast (Dianna Agron, Chris Colfer, Darren Criss) summer 2011 concert tour feature songs "Raise Your Glass," "Teenage Dream" and other songs.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Cormoran Strike and Robin Ellacott are at odds following Robin's wedding to Matthew; a visit from a potential client puts a new case on the table.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: A startling discovery seems to confirm the story of the strangled child, but the team are forced to leave the scene before they can properly investigate; fearing their witness is in danger, they redouble their efforts to find him.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Robin discovers a startling truth close to home; the government minister's blackmailer becomes the prime suspect in the case, but Robin and Strike believe there was an accomplice.

programme.title: C.B. Strike

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: In an Australia of the not-too-distant future, a police officer strikes back against motorized menaces to what is left of society after a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Spies (Julia Roberts, Clive Owen) for rival corporations carry on a clandestine love affair while trying to find the formula for a product that will earn a fortune for the company that patents it first.

programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.
